questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common waterborne pathogen in Timor-Leste?
What is the hygiene hypothesis?
choices: The idea that excessive cleanliness leads to better health
The theory that lack of early microbial exposure increases susceptibility to allergic diseases
The concept that all microbes are harmful and should be eliminated
The belief that rural areas have better hygiene than urban areas
questions.answer: The theory that lack of early microbial exposure increases susceptibility to allergic diseases
